configuration:
yarn.resourcemanager.scheduler.class org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.scheduler.fair.FairScheduler
yarn.nodemanager.resource.cpu-vcores <%= node[:cpu][:total] %>
yarn.nodemanager.resource.memory-mb <%= (node[:hadoop2][:yarn][:containers] * node[:hadoop2][:yarn][:mem_per_container] * 1024).to_i %>
yarn.scheduler.minimum-allocation-mb <%= (node[:hadoop2][:yarn][:mem_per_container] * 1024).to_i %>
yarn.scheduler.maximum-allocation-mb <%= (node[:hadoop2][:yarn][:containers] * node[:hadoop2][:yarn][:mem_per_container] * 1024).to_i %>
yarn.app.mapreduce.am.command-opts -Xmx<%= (0.8 * 2 * node[:hadoop2][:yarn][:mem_per_container] * 1024).to_i %>m
yarn.nodemanager.aux-services mapreduce_shuffle
yarn.nodemanager.local-dirs /var/app/hadoop2/storage/nodemanager
yarn.nodemanager.log-dirs /var/log/hadoop2/userlogs
yarn.log-aggregation-enable true
<% if node.role?("hadoop2-resourcemanager") %>
yarn.resourcemanager.hostname <%= node[:fqdn] %>
yarn.web-proxy.address <%= node[:fqdn] %>:8088
<% end %> <% if hadoop2_resourcemanagers.count > 1 %>
yarn.resourcemanager.ha.enabled true
yarn.resourcemanager.ha.automatic-failover.enabled true
yarn.resourcemanager.ha.automatic-failover.embedded true
yarn.resourcemanager.cluster-id <%= node[:hadoop2][:yarn][:cluster] %>
yarn.resourcemanager.ha.rm-ids <%= hadoop2_resourcemanagers.map { |n| "rm#{n[:cluster][:host][:id]}" }.join(',') %>
<% if node.role?("hadoop2-resourcemanager") %>
yarn.resourcemanager.ha.id <%= "rm#{node[:cluster][:host][:id]}" %>
<% end %>
yarn.resourcemanager.recovery.enabled true
yarn.resourcemanager.zk-address <%= zookeeper_connect('/hadoop2', node[:hadoop2][:zookeeper][:cluster]) %>
yarn.resourcemanager.zk-state-store.parent-path /rmstore/<%= node[:hadoop2][:yarn][:cluster] %>
yarn.resourcemanager.store.class org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.recovery.ZKRMStateStore
yarn.resourcemanager.max-completed-applications 100
<% hadoop2_resourcemanagers.each do |n| %>
yarn.resourcemanager.address.rm<%= n[:cluster][:host][:id] %> <%= n[:fqdn] %>:23140
yarn.resourcemanager.scheduler.address.rm<%= n[:cluster][:host][:id] %> <%= n[:fqdn] %>:23130
yarn.resourcemanager.webapp.address.rm<%= n[:cluster][:host][:id] %> <%= n[:fqdn] %>:8088
yarn.resourcemanager.resource-tracker.address.rm<%= n[:cluster][:host][:id] %> <%= n[:fqdn] %>:23125
yarn.resourcemanager.admin.address.rm<%= n[:cluster][:host][:id] %> <%= n[:fqdn] %>:23141
yarn.resourcemanager.ha.admin.address.rm<%= n[:cluster][:host][:id] %> <%= n[:fqdn] %>:23142
yarn.web-proxy.address.rm<%= n[:cluster][:host][:id] %> <%= n[:fqdn] %>:8088
<% end %> <% end %>
